Panasonic BD2015 FVP - device issue - Device shows black screen upto 13 seconds, after user trigger exit key in remote to exit application
Panasonic BD 2015 FVP - iplayer - playback - Video and audio disconnects for 1 second at beginning of video playback and when user seeks the video to a new point.
CATAL - The Persistent memory test fails as the Time stamp cookies are not maintained between  app launches via broadcast and via portal.
CATAL - The "Confirm application can get channel name for CATAL Test channel." test fails for FVP when executed from the "HTML auto Class Boot Carousel" channel.
CATAL - In the live asset BBC1HD (Live), the range does not update/increment  periodically throughout playback.
CATAL - The "Pause and resume at the end of the seekable range" test for the live asset BBC1HD (Live)  fails with an error event after selecting resume intermittently in portal.

CATAL - For the LIVE DASH programme, the range and the counter doesn’t update/increment periodically and remains 0 throughout the playback. Due to this the sentinel kicks in and the video is always in the Buffering state.
CATAL - For the LIVE DASH programme, after triggering playfrom 60s, the video seems to start from the same point which was playing before.
CATAL - Pause doesn’t work in Live DASH.
CATAL - The live point is played for a second just before the seek takes place to the 60 second point, during  "play from 60 seconds of the BBC1HD (Live)" test.
CATAL - 'Pressing Pause and resume triggers a seek to the position 383 for the asset 128_SBR_AUDIOFACTORY.

CATAL - The transition between the ABR representations happnes with a playback refresh/ flicker (a momentary black screen) and is not completely seamless. This has been observed intermittently with ABR DASH and not always like in the case of ABR HLS.
CATAL - 'Periodically there is a sentinel-enter-buffering and sentinel -exit-buffering event triggered. When run from broadcast. This does not occur always.

CATAL - During the "Verify video resumes playing from a buffering state when bandwidth is throttled up to 4Mbps from 300-500kbps" It takes 2~3 seconds for the audio to play after the video starts playing. Observed 5/10 times.
CATAL - 'The keymappings of skip forwards and backwards are not detected in the broadcast CATAL.
CATAL - The Subtitle and info keys trigger broadcast functionalities when tested from broadcast and when the tests are triggered from portal then the keys are displayed as unmapped.
CATAL - When the user plays after a pause, the video plays a repeated part from an earlier frame, while frame size being around 5 seconds.( 5 seconds maximum)
CATAL - 'During seek to end, Sentinel-Seek-Failure event  is triggered twice and then the video completes after  10 or more seconds of playback.
CATAL - 'There is a Video resize/refresh before the video seeks.
CATAL - When CATAL is launched with broadcast enabled (press 6) and Turn off Video is triggered, Video stops but audio continues to play for 3-4 seconds, and then stops.
CATAL - Device shows black screen for 1-2 seconds after seeking.
CATAL - When Playfrom end is triggered, status is correctly displayed as COMPLETE, but TIME is different than DURATION.
CATAL - Sometimes video starts stuttering after Switching the MP4 stream. (Observed 2 times)
CATAL- When Playfrom Start is triggered in a live HLS video, A frame from live point appears for a second and then video starts from the beginning of seekable range.
CATAL - When a HLS Live video is paused and resumed after few seconds, the range stops updating
CATAL - News advert video plays in Pillar box mode. When video is triggered from broadcast, video plays in even smaller pillar box.
RB+ - RB+ exits after doing back journey from child app.
Bug Verification - issues during previous certification cycle
Consolidated Report
Sanity test all apps following successful bug verifications
